article_title: Predicting Sports Injuries with Wearable Technology and Data Analysis
article_abstract: Injuries resulting from sports and physical activities can be persistent and pose a substantial problem for player’s economic wellbeing and quality of life. Wearable technologies in conjunction with analytics can help mitigate the risk to players by identifying injury risk factors and focusing on risk reduction.
